VAR_WARNING_MSG:
entering more then 6 variables,
 can cause performance issues.
Proceed?

COLORS_MENU.DESCRIPTION:
here you can add/remove colors for the markings in th KV Diagramm.
If you add a color make sure that color is Defined in Latex.
COLORS_MENU.INVALID_COLOR:
"{hex_col}" is not a valid hex Color
Please use the format "#RRGGBB".
Where:
  RR = Amount of Red
  GG = Amount of Green
  BB = Amount of Blue
with 00 being None and FF being the most
COLORS_MENU.COLOR_EXISTS:
the Color "{col_name}" already exists.
If you want to overide it please remove it and add again.
